discourse_list.title: A market-based mechanism for generating coins

content.content: I am new to the maker community and am looking for detailed feedback about a specific idea that I have for generating new coins. The mechanism that I came up with can also be applied in the conventional financial system to generate new money. It operates by regulating the supply of money so that an interest rate determined by a public market remains fixed. I wrote a paper about the mechanism (link below), and now I am trying to understand whether or not it is possible to implement it within the framework of the Maker system, and whether or not there are other cryptocurrencies where it would be easier to implement. I would appreciate any detailed feedback about this, thanks!! Elastic Cash
content.GPT-summary: The author is seeking feedback on a market-based mechanism for generating coins that can be applied in the conventional financial system. The author has written a paper about the mechanism and is looking for feedback on whether it can be implemented within the framework of the Maker system or other cryptocurrencies. The post is asking for detailed feedback and constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
